citations.narrative:
The holding pen for the two adult capybara had three metal framed gates with severe rusting and corrosion at the bottom
of the door jambs resulting in sharp points. Presence of sharp points in the animals' housing area can result in bodily
injury. Licensees must ensure that the outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in
good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by removing rust corroded metal and sharp points from the capybara enclosure by 28 July 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The holding pen for the two adult capybara had three metal framed gates with severe rusting and corrosion at the bottom 
of the door jambs resulting in sharp points. Presence of sharp points in the animals' housing area can result in bodily 
injury. Licensees must ensure that the outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in 
good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
 
Correct by removing rust corroded metal and sharp points from the capybara enclosure by 28 July 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
